divs: sighting detailssaw above craft hovering over youghagenny river in mckeesport pa....appeared to be pulling water out of the river ...and in an instant zoomed off to the west at incredible speed..called into local radio station it was wmck at the time. i was on our front porch that overlooked the river in port vue \accross the river from downtown mckeesport the pulsating color changes caught my attention vibrant colors... currently was watching history channel and someone had reported a sighting simular to mine...have told many people but none seem to believe me. was 20 yrs old at the time ..age 61 now ..oh the dj on duty at the time i reported it was terry lee. thank you
Summary: cigar shapped with 6 pods for landing pulsating florecent lights
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in McKeesport
There were no other sightings in McKeesport on or around May 31st 1965
